alert.note: Alert for Furnas; Gosper; Harlan; Phelps (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 09 at 8:28AM CDT until May 09 at 8:45AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 AM CDT FOR SOUTHERN PHELPS...SOUTHEASTERN GOSPER...FURNAS AND HARLAN COUNTIES... At 828 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Bertrand to near Oxford to near Wilsonville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters reported up to half dollar size hail in Edison. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Oxford and Bertrand around 835 AM CDT. Stamford around 840 AM CDT. Loomis and Hendley around 845 AM CDT. Atlanta around 850 AM CDT. Holdrege and Orleans around 855 AM CDT. Funk and Huntley around 910 AM CDT. Ragan around 915 AM CDT. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
